title: Club tag creations bugged?
body:
Its not bringing up the "create club tag" button in the club tab.
Did they change this or what.

(their are currently 6 members on it)

replies.body:
Club tag creation is currently disabled due to bugs. The team is working on resolving the issue, but there's no ETA at this time. Sorry about that!

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/AnHEmOh7-club-tag-creation-disabled-and-server-error-message-in-client
